Response.Say: Our meeting time and location have changed. Starting January 7, we will meet every Sunday at The Women's Building at 18th Street and Valencia, near the 16th Street Mission Bart station. The meeting on January 7 will run from 10AM to noon. The meetings on January fourteenth and twenty-first will run from 4pm to 6pm.
If you'd like to register or learn more, please leave a message with your phone number or email address at the tone.
